Warriors believe Klay Thompson’s return will make them a ‘championship-caliber team’

Klay Thompson thinks he’ll be cleared for full-contact practice around the one-year anniversary of his Nov. 25 Achilles surgery. It might then take the five-time All-Star four to six weeks to regain his conditioning. Whenever he gets on the court, the Golden State Warriors believe Thompson will put them back into title contention.

Relatives are being ‘hunted’ in Afghanistan. He wants them in California

As an Afghan judge and her husband hide from the Taliban, their relative tries to help them escape to Northern California, but bumps up against an expensive, “byzantine” immigration system. The family’s desperate attempt reveals the dire circumstances many face following the U.S. withdrawal.
Data: California’s Afghan population is the largest in the U.S.
Two wine superstars bought 162 acres of what some consider California's best Syrah vines

Pax Mahle of Pax wines and entrepreneur Baron Ziegler  have purchased the Halcon Vineyard, a site that some aficionados consider to be the finest vineyard for Syrah in California. It’s a wine insider’s secret, known for its savory and muscular style of wine.
